titles.title: Veterans Amputee and Rehabilitation Act of 2006
To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish centers to provide enhanced services to veterans with amputations and prosthetic devices, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 11/13/2006--Introduced. Veterans Amputee and Rehabilitation Act of 2006 - Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish not less than five centers to provide enhanced rehabilitation services to veterans with amputations or prosthetic devices. Requires each center to be designated as an Amputation and Prosthetic Rehabilitation Center.
